meanings.definition: A large earthworm used as bait in fishing.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman dug for lobworms to use as bait.
meanings.sent2: I bought a container of lobworms for our fishing trip.
meanings.sent3: The lobworms decided to go on strike, so the fish had a lucky day.
meanings.sent4: The lobworms wriggled like dancers on the hook.
meanings.sent5: The lobworms squirmed in the dirt, enticing the fish with their movement.
